event.name: OnCalendar
event.help: A day was double clicked in the calendar.

event.name: OnCalendarSelChanged
event.help: The selected date changed.

event.name: OnCalendarDay
event.help: The selected day changed.

event.name: OnCalendarMonth
event.help: The selected month changed.

event.name: OnCalendarYear
event.help: The selected year changed.

event.name: OnCalendarWeekDayClicked
event.help: User clicked on the week day header.

event.name: OnDateChanged
event.help: This event fires when the user changes the current selection in the control.

event.name: OnColourChanged
event.help: The user changed the colour selected in the control either using the button or using text control (see wxCLRP_USE_TEXTCTRL; note that in this case the event is fired only if the user's input is valid, i.e. recognizable).

property.name: max_point_size
property.help: Sets the maximum point size value allowed for the user-chosen font. The default value is 100. Note that big fonts can require a lot of memory and CPU time both for creation and for rendering; thus, specially because the user has the option to specify the fontsize through a text control (see wxFNTP_USE_TEXTCTRL), it's a good idea to put a limit to the maximum font size when huge fonts do not make much sense.

event.name: OnFontChanged
event.help: The user changed the font selected in the control either using the button or using text control (see wxFNTP_USE_TEXTCTRL; note that in this case the event is fired only if the user's input is valid, i.e. recognizable).

event.name: OnHtmlCellClicked
event.help: A wxHtmlCell was clicked.

event.name: OnHtmlCellHover
event.help: The mouse passed over a wxHtmlCell.

event.name: OnHtmlLinkClicked
event.help: A wxHtmlCell which contains an hyperlink was clicked.

event.name: OnTreeBeginDrag
event.help: Begin dragging with the left mouse button.

event.name: OnTreeBeginRDrag
event.help: Begin dragging with the right mouse button.

event.name: OnTreeEndDrag
event.help: End dragging with the left or right mouse button.

event.name: OnTreeBeginLabelEdit
event.help: Begin editing a label. This can be prevented by calling Veto().

event.name: OnTreeEndLabelEdit
event.help: Finish editing a label. This can be prevented by calling Veto().

event.name: OnTreeDeleteItem
event.help: Delete an item.

event.name: OnTreeGetInfo
event.help: Request information from the application.

event.name: OnTreeSetInfo
event.help: Information is being supplied.

event.name: OnTreeItemActivated
event.help: The item has been activated, i.e. chosen by double clicking it with mouse or from keyboard.

event.name: OnTreeItemCollapsed
event.help: The item has been collapsed.

event.name: OnTreeItemCollapsing
event.help: The item is being collapsed. This can be prevented by calling Veto().

event.name: OnTreeItemExpanded
event.help: The item has been expanded.

event.name: OnTreeItemExpanding
event.help: The item is being expanded. This can be prevented by calling Veto().

event.name: OnTreeItemRightClick
event.help: The user has clicked the item with the right mouse button

event.name: OnTreeItemMiddleClick
event.help: The user has clicked the item with the middle mouse button.

event.name: OnTreeSelChanged
event.help: Selection has changed.

event.name: OnTreeSelChanging
event.help: Selection is changing. This can be prevented by calling Veto().

event.name: OnTreeKeyDown
event.help: A key has been pressed.

event.name: OnTreeItemGetTooltip
event.help: The opportunity to set the item tooltip is being given to the application (call wxTreeEvent::SetToolTip). Windows only.

event.name: OnTreeItemMenu
event.help: The context menu for the selected item has been requested, either by a right click or by using the menu key.

event.name: OnTreeStateImageClick
event.help: The state image has been clicked. Windows only.

option.name: wxRB_GROUP
option.help: Marks the beginning of a new group of radio buttons.

option.name: wxRB_SINGLE
option.help: In some circumstances, radio buttons that are not consecutive siblings trigger a hang bug in Windows (only). If this happens, add this style to mark the button as not belonging to a group, and implement the mutually-exclusive group behaviour yourself.

option.name: wxRB_USE_CHECKBOX
option.help: Use a checkbox button instead of radio button (currently supported only on PalmOS).

event.name: OnRadioButton
event.help: Handles a toggle button click event.

event.name: OnToggleButton
event.help: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_RADIOBUTTON_SELECTED event, when the radiobutton is clicked.

property.name: value
property.help: The position of the scrollbar in scroll units.

property.name: range
property.help: The maximum position of the scrollbar.

property.name: thumbsize
property.help: The size of the thumb, or visible portion of the scrollbar, in scroll units.

property.name: pagesize
property.help: This is the number of scroll units that will be scrolled when the user pages up or down.

event.name: OnScroll
event.help: Process all scroll events.

event.name: OnScrollTop
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_TOP scroll-to-top events (minimum position).

event.name: OnScrollBottom
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_BOTTOM scroll-to-bottom events (maximum position).

event.name: OnScrollLineUp
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_LINEUP line up events.

event.name: OnScrollLineDown
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_LINEDOWN line down events.

event.name: OnScrollPageUp
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_PAGEUP page up events.

event.name: OnScrollPageDown
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_PAGEDOWN page down events.

event.name: OnScrollThumbTrack
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_THUMBTRACK thumbtrack events (frequent events sent as the user drags the thumbtrack).

event.name: OnScrollThumbRelease
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_THUMBRELEASE thumb release events.

event.name: OnScrollChanged
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_CHANGED end of scrolling events (MSW only).

event.name: OnCommandScroll
event.help: Process all scroll events. Variant taking a window identifier.

event.name: OnCommandScrollTop
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_TOP scroll-to-top events (minimum position). Variant taking a window identifier.

event.name: OnCommandScrollBottom
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_BOTTOM scroll-to-bottom events (maximum position). Variant taking a window identifier.

event.name: OnCommandScrollLineUp
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_LINEUP line up events. Variant taking a window identifier.

event.name: OnCommandScrollLineDown
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_LINEDOWN line down events. Variant taking a window identifier.

event.name: OnCommandScrollPageUp
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_PAGEUP page up events. Variant taking a window identifier.

event.name: OnCommandScrollPageDown
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_PAGEDOWN page down events. Variant taking a window identifier.

event.name: OnCommandScrollThumbTrack
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_THUMBTRACK thumbtrack events (frequent events sent as the user drags the thumbtrack). Variant taking a window identifier.

event.name: OnCommandScrollThumbRelease
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_THUMBRELEASE thumb release events. Variant taking a window identifier.

event.name: OnCommandScrollChanged
event.help: Process wxEVT_SCROLL_CHANGED end of scrolling events (MSW only). Variant taking a window identifier.

event.name: OnSpinCtrl
event.help: Generated whenever the numeric value of the spinctrl is updated.

event.name: OnSpinCtrlText
event.help: Generated whenever the user modifies the text in the edit part of the spin control directly.

option.name: wxSP_HORIZONTAL
option.help: Specifies a horizontal spin button (note that this style is not supported in wxGTK).

option.name: wxSP_VERTICAL
option.help: Specifies a vertical spin button.

option.name: wxSP_ARROW_KEYS
option.help: The user can use arrow keys to change the value.

option.name: wxSP_WRAP
option.help: The value wraps at the minimum and maximum.

event.name: OnSpin
event.help: Generated whenever an arrow is pressed.

event.name: OnSpinUp
event.help: Generated when left/up arrow is pressed.

event.name: OnSpinDown
event.help: Generated when right/down arrow is pressed.

property.name: sashsize
property.help: Overrides platform metrics if greater than -1

property.name: sashgravity
property.help: Sets the sash gravity. Remarks: Gravity is real factor which controls position of sash while resizing wxSplitterWindow. Gravity tells wxSplitterWindow how much will left/top window grow while resizing.

property.name: min_pane_size
property.help: Minimum size for the panes. A minimum less than 1 is not allowed in the designer, because the designer prevents un-splitting.

event.name: OnSplitterSashPosChanging
event.help: The sash position is in the process of being changed. May be used to modify the position of the tracking bar to properly reflect the position that would be set if the drag were to be completed at this point. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_SPLITTER_SASH_POS_CHANGING event.

event.name: OnSplitterSashPosChanged
event.help: The sash position was changed. May be used to modify the sash position before it is set, or to prevent the change from taking place. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_SPLITTER_SASH_POS_CHANGED event.

event.name: OnSplitterUnsplit
event.help: The splitter has been just unsplit. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_SPLITTER_UNSPLIT event.

event.name: OnSplitterDClick
event.help: The sash was double clicked. The default behaviour is to unsplit the window when this happens (unless the minimum pane size has been set to a value greater than zero). Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_SPLITTER_DOUBLECLICKED event.

option.name: wxLB_SINGLE
option.help: Single-selection list.

option.name: wxLB_MULTIPLE
option.help: Multiple-selection list: the user can toggle multiple items on and off.

option.name: wxLB_EXTENDED
option.help: Extended-selection list: the user can select multiple items using the SHIFT key and the mouse or special key combinations.

option.name: wxLB_HSCROLL
option.help: Create horizontal scrollbar if contents are too wide (Windows only).

option.name: wxLB_ALWAYS_SB
option.help: Always show a vertical scrollbar.

option.name: wxLB_NEEDED_SB
option.help: Only create a vertical scrollbar if needed.

option.name: wxLB_SORT
option.help: The listbox contents are sorted in alphabetical order.

event.name: OnCheckListBoxToggled
event.help: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKLISTBOX_TOGGLED event, when an item in the check list box is checked or unchecked.

event.name: OnCheckListBox
event.help: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_LISTBOX_SELECTED event, when an item on the list is selected.

event.name: OnCheckListBoxDClick
event.help: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_LISTBOX_DOUBLECLICKED event, when the listbox is double-clicked.

option.name: wxNB_TOP
option.help: Place tabs on the top side.

option.name: wxNB_LEFT
option.help: Place tabs on the left side.

option.name: wxNB_RIGHT
option.help: Place tabs on the right side.

option.name: wxNB_BOTTOM
option.help: Place tabs under instead of above the notebook pages.

option.name: wxNB_FIXEDWIDTH
option.help: All tabs will have same width. (Windows only)

option.name: wxNB_MULTILINE
option.help: There can be several rows of tabs. (Windows only)

option.name: wxNB_NOPAGETHEME
option.help: Display a solid colour on notebook pages, and not a gradient, which can reduce performance. (Windows only)

option.name: wxNB_FLAT
option.help: Show tabs in a flat style. (Windows only)

event.name: OnNotebookPageChanged
event.help: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

event.name: OnNotebookPageChanging
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed.

event.name: OnListbookPageChanged
event.help: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LISTBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

event.name: OnListbookPageChanging
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_LISTBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed.

event.name: OnChoicebookPageChanged
event.help: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_CHOICEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

event.name: OnChoicebookPageChanging
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_CHOICEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed.
